title: System.DllNotFoundException: libskia_osx.dylib
body:
It looks like the NuGet package of SkiaSharp is failing to copy `libskia_osx.dylib` to Mac applications during the build. To repro:
1. Create a MonoMac (Open Source) Cocoa Project.
2. Add the SkiaSharp Nuget package.
3. Add some code that uses SkiaSharp.
4. Run the application.
5. Application crashes with `System.DllNotFoundException: libskia_osx.dylib`.

After manually copying `SkiaSharp.1.49.1.0/build/net45/mac/libskia_osx.dylib` to `bin/Debug/MyApp.app/Contents/MonoBundle/` the app runs perfectly.

I was able to reproduce in both SkiaSharp.1.49.1.0 and SkiaSharp.1.49.4-beta.
